item.title: 2020-02-13: Epidemic Mitigation Time Forecast (Covid-19)
item.description: Time trends and model predictions of confirmed cases across the country Our model shows that the national epidemic situation will ease on 02-24 (the number of confirmed cases will not increase significantly). On 2020-02-13 there will be 1183 new confirmed cases and in total 45781 confirmed cases. National Epidemic Time Series Date Total Conf. Crnt Conf. Crnt Susp. Crnt Sevr. Total Death. Total Cured Total Conf.+Susp.
